name: Carson Air Ltd.
about: At Carson Air Ltd., our flying school, operating through the Southern Interior Flight Centre in Kelowna, is dedicated to excellence in aviation education. We offer a range of programs, including Recreational Permits, Private and Commercial Pilot Licenses, and a Commercial Aviation Diploma in partnership with Okanagan College. Our fleet includes Cessna 172s, a Beech Duchess, and a Piper Seneca V, along with advanced simulators. Our experienced instructors provide comprehensive training in multi-engine and instrument ratings, preparing students for careers in airline, commuter, medevac, and private aviation. With a strong commitment to safety, service, and education, we foster a dynamic and respectful learning environment, ensuring our students are well-equipped for successful aviation careers.
